title: Human Race Must Never Give in to AI or Governments

title: Fabrizio Poll: Backing National AI Standard Boosts Candidates
description: Polling by Fabrizio Ward on behalf of Building America’s Future indicates that congressional candidates who champion a unified national framework for artificial intelligence — framed around child protection and parental empowerment — secure a clear electoral advantage.
